content.raw:
@thomasko please see pull request #157, proposed changes should improve overall physics solution without significant impact to dynamics.  Please review and comment.  Thanks.

A new model will be released by BDI soon, with major suspected change being the addition of the power backpack, but I think we'll hold back on adding the backpack into Atlas for VRC/Quals.
content.html:
@thomasko please see pull request #157, proposed changes should improve overall physics solution without significant impact to dynamics. Please review and comment. Thanks.

A new model will be released by BDI soon, with major suspected change being the addition of the power backpack, but I think we'll hold back on adding the backpack into Atlas for VRC/Quals.
